title: MAmmoTH: Building Math Generalist Models through Hybrid Instruction Tuning
content:
MAmmoTH is a series of open-source large language models (LLMs) specifically tailored for general math problem-solving. The MAmmoTH models are trained on MathInstruct, a meticulously curated instruction tuning dataset that is lightweight yet generalizable.

GitHub: https://github.com/TIGER-AI-Lab/MAmmoTH
License: MIT

MathInstruct is compiled from 13 math rationale datasets, six of which are newly curated by this work. It uniquely focuses on the hybrid use of chain-of-thought (CoT) and program-of-thought (PoT) rationales, and ensures extensive coverage of diverse mathematical fields.
